name: Brake Authority Shimano XTR 03-07 Burly Brake Pads
description: Brake Authority's Burly compound is designed for all mountain and enduro riding and lasts a remarkably long time.For Shimano® XTR 03-07, Saint 04-07, Deore LX 05-07, XT 04-07, and SLX 09 disc brake systems.Easy to control for progressive braking power.Ready to ride.
